name: Super~Shot~EX
description:
Our immortal descendants, scattered amongst the stars, hunt ancient eggs of fallen gods. With high hopes of conceiving a Starchild to restore the balance of life and death in the universe, special few are chosen by the collective to venture out as part of the "Conception Initiative".  You are a part of that special few Pilot. Supports: Gamepad/Touch/Tilt/Keyboard **** Game contains loud noises/ flashes **** Press Start/Click/Shift Key/Tap to start.
Press Gamepad Back Button to enter Full-Screen.

Steam Group/ Discord / My Site

*No music in game yet but here is a curated playlist, best played at about 20% volume*

*Please note that the volume of the music should be adjusted to the game sound:*

^Click the image for full game controls/ basics. Greetings Pilot, The game is optimized for desktop but works on mobile too. A little below the game window is a thoughtfully curated playlist of recommended tracks that fit the games vibe and summon the spirit of atmosphere I hope to eventually create. I plan on producing a custom soundtrack for this game soon. The game is still early in development, about 5 1/2 weeks old at the time of posting this.  Below the game window is a brief slideshow of all the different inputs the game supports. To support the work or learn more about Super~Shot~EX/ other projects/or join a community check out: https://www.supersomethinggames.com

Please feel free to  capture/record/share your gameplay with the steam community/discord, but please no press or social media sharing yet. Please share any sort of feedback, comments, or issues in the comments section or in the games discord/ steam chat. Thank you so much for taking the time to check this out. Cheers!

Here is a completely, spoiler free, overview of the demo/alpha features in the form of a list for anyone who is into lists/ details.
